description: Try our easy to follow Slow-Roasted Tandoori Lamb Shoulder recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Slow-Roasted Tandoori Lamb Shoulder Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove pan from oven, uncover, discarding foil and paper. Return pan to oven and cook for a further 30 minutes or until lamb is golden. Scatter with coriander and serve with yoghurt and lemon wedges.
